SimpleDataListSpec.Name: Transfer Children To Sponsor Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: List of transfer children available for sponsorship
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPSimpleList.common:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_TRANSFERCHILDREN_TO_SPONSOR as select soc.ID as VALUE, soc.NAME as LABEL from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = soc.ID where so.AVAILABILITYCODE IN (0,1) order by NAME
